name: ai-gen
title: OpenAI Generator
description: AI generation using OpenAI's GPT-3 and DALL·E AI models
author: josephschmitt

commands.name: createImage
commands.title: Create Image
commands.subtitle: DALL·E Image Generation
commands.description: Generate images using OpenAI's DALL·E 2, an AI system that can create realistic images and art from a description in natural language

commands.name: createImageVariation
commands.title: Create Image Variation
commands.subtitle: DALL·E Existing Image Variation
commands.description: Generate a variation of an existing image using OpenAI's DALL·E 2

commands.name: createImageEdit
commands.title: Create Image Edit
commands.subtitle: DALL·E Existing Image Edit
commands.description: Generate an edited or extended image given an original image and a prompt using OpenAI's DALL·E 2

commands.name: completeText
commands.title: Complete Text
commands.subtitle: GPT-3 Text Completion
commands.description: Input some text as a prompt, and generate a text completion that attempts to match whatever context or pattern you gave it

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: API Key
preferences.description: API Key from OpenAI.com. Generate your own key at https://beta.openai.com/account/api-keys

preferences.name: enableDrafts
preferences.label: Enable drafts
preferences.title: Drafts
preferences.description: Any un-submitted requests will be stored as a draft and can be resumed from the main Raycast window

preferences.name: storeValue
preferences.label: Store prompt
preferences.title: Prompts
preferences.description: Store your most recently submitted prompt instead of starting from a blank slate when running the command next
